# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/urllib3/__init__.py
@source-hash: 8972dc6222724a7d
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:01:05Z

## Purpose
Package initialization module for urllib3 - a Python HTTP library providing thread-safe connection pooling, file post support, and HTTP client functionality. This module serves as the main entry point, exposing core APIs and configuring default behavior.

## Key Exports and APIs

### Core Connection Classes
- `HTTPConnectionPool` (L13, L44): Basic HTTP connection pool implementation
- `HTTPSConnectionPool` (L13, L45): HTTPS connection pool with SSL/TLS support  
- `PoolManager` (L15, L46): High-level connection pool manager for multiple hosts
- `ProxyManager` (L15, L47): Specialized pool manager for proxy connections

### Response and Utility Classes
- `HTTPResponse` (L16, L48): HTTP response wrapper object
- `Retry` (L18, L49): Configurable retry logic for failed requests
- `Timeout` (L19, L50): Timeout configuration and handling

### Utility Functions
- `connection_from_url` (L13, L52): Factory function to create connection pools from URLs
- `proxy_from_url` (L15, L57): Factory function for proxy manager creation
- `encode_multipart_formdata` (L14, L54): Multipart form encoding for file uploads
- `make_headers` (L17, L56): HTTP header construction utilities
- `get_host` (L20, L55): URL host extraction utility

### Logging and Warning Management
- `add_stderr_logger()` (L63-78): Configures stderr logging handler for debugging
- `disable_warnings()` (L98-102): Disables urllib3 warning categories

## Dependencies and Imports
- Standard library: `logging`, `warnings` for infrastructure
- Internal modules: `exceptions`, `_version`, `connectionpool`, `filepost`, `poolmanager`, `response`, and various `util` submodules
- Optional: `urllib3_secure_extra` (deprecated secure extras, L26-37)

## Configuration and Setup

### Default Logging (L60)
Sets up NullHandler to prevent "No handler found" warnings during normal operation.

### Warning Filter Configuration (L89-95)
Configures default warning behaviors for security-related warnings:
- `SecurityWarning`: Always shown
- `SubjectAltNameWarning`: Default behavior (once per host)
- `InsecurePlatformWarning`: Default behavior  
- `SNIMissingWarning`: Default behavior (once only)

### Deprecated Features
- `urllib3_secure_extra` import block (L26-37): Handles deprecated secure extras with deprecation warning

## Architectural Notes
- Uses `__all__` (L43-58) to explicitly control public API surface
- Maintains backward compatibility while warning about deprecated features
- Centralizes warning management for consistent user experience
- Module-level cleanup removes imported utilities (L82) to avoid namespace pollution
